30001000.English_Text: Let's talk with the captain here first.
30001000.Chinese_Text:
首先,让我们在这里和船长谈谈
.

30001001.Chinese_Text: 写了吗? <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>灵魂</>我遇见了你!?

30001002.English_Text: Ugh~! I want you to save me!

30001004.English_Text: Have you collected all of the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Medal of Merit</>?

30001005.English_Text: You got the job done sooner than I thought.
30001005.Chinese_Text: 你比我想象的更早完成了工作.

30001007.English_Text:
Bring your <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Medal of Merit</>, 
I will exchange it for your <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>package</> ~
30001007.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>如果你带了一个功勋牌</>,我会把它换成
我的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>包</>.

30001008.English_Text:
Catch <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Burnthead</> at random,
You can get a core.
30001008.Chinese_Text:
随机烧毁</>,抓到<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>,可以获得
核心.

30001009.Original_Text: 연구 보조금을 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>기부</>하시면 제가 가진 핵을 드릴게요. \n사정이 사정이라 액수가 좀 크긴 합니다만... 허허...
30001009.English_Text:
If you <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>donate</> for a research grant, I'll give you the nucleus I have. 
The amount is a bit large due to circumstances, but... heh heh...
30001009.Chinese_Text:
如果你<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>捐赠</>研究经费,我会给你我拥有的核心. 
 金额因情况有点大,不过……呵呵……

30001010.English_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>, are you okay?! 
What memories did you see?
30001010.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>,你没事吧?! 
 你看到了什么记忆?

30001012.English_Text: Let's go out and find <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Ereda Barracks</>.

30001013.English_Text: It's over here~ It's this way~

30001015.English_Text: Try on the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>clothes</> that I just gave you~

30001016.Original_Text: 매화단, 영교원, 도화상전, 그리고 금경철문.\n이 네 단체의 수장을 통칭 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>사호</>라 부릅니다.
30001016.English_Text:
Maehwadan, Yeonggyowon, Dohwasangjeon, and Geumgyeongcheolmun.
The heads of these four groups are collectively called <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</>.
30001016.Chinese_Text:
梅花团、英桥元、土和上田、金景哲门 
这四个团的团长统称为<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>沙虎</>.

30001017.Original_Text: 사호의 의뢰를 해결하고 그 증거로\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>대어방 유공상패</>를 받아오십시오.
30001017.English_Text:
Solve Saho's quest and receive the 
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Daeeobang Achievement Plaque</> as proof.
30001017.Chinese_Text:
解决沙穗的要求,带上
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>大雄方功勋牌</>作为证明.

30001018.English_Text:
I'm sorry! It's a surprise!
What's your guy like?!
30001018.Chinese_Text:
艾昆!真是惊喜!
 你的男人是什么样的?!

30001019.English_Text: Try the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Guard Spirit Summon Scroll</> I gave you!
30001019.Chinese_Text: 尝试使用我给你的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>守护灵召唤卷轴</>!

30001020.Original_Text: 사호님들은 지금 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>광장</>에 모여있다냥.\n광장은 여기서 충분히 걸어갈 수 있다냥~!
30001020.English_Text:
Your bosses are now gathering in the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>plaza</>.
The plaza is within walking distance from here~!
30001020.Chinese_Text:
BOSS们聚集在<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>广场</>.
广场就在咫尺之遥~!

30001021.Original_Text: 준비가 되면 말하게.\n내가 난파선까지 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>순간이동</> 시켜주겠네. 퍼로롱~
30001021.English_Text:
Tell me when you're ready.
I'll <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>teleport</> to the wreck. Perorong~
30001021.Chinese_Text:
准备好后告诉我.
我会让你<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>把我传送到沉船.佩罗蓉~

30001022.English_Text: Heh heh heh... what the heck...

30001023.English_Text: I need to save my friends...

30001024.Original_Text: 정말 고맙다냥...\n친구들은 이 길을 따라가면 있다냥.
30001024.English_Text:
Thank you so much...
You can find friends along this road.
30001024.Chinese_Text:
非常感谢...
 如果你走这条路,我的朋友就在那里.

30001025.English_Text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>People with blue skin</> suddenly
attacked us... gloom...
30001025.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蓝色皮肤的人</>突然
袭击了我们......

30001026.English_Text: They don't taste good even if we eat them!!

30001027.English_Text: Looks like there's no one here! Somebody needs some help!
30001027.Chinese_Text: 好像没有人一样!有人请帮忙!

30001028.English_Text: Looks like everyone is safe! Good luck!
30001028.Chinese_Text: 好像每个人都没事!我很高兴!

30001029.Chinese_Text:
我们很好! 
 那个人救了我们!

30001030.English_Text: Suddenly he appeared like a hero and defeated them all!
30001030.Chinese_Text: 他突然如英雄般出现,将他们全部击败!

30001032.English_Text:
Just get the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Half Moonflower</> inside.
Thank you so much!
30001032.Chinese_Text:
只要把<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>半月蜡烛</>带进去就行了.
非常感谢!

30001034.English_Text: The <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Medal of Merit</> is in the box next to it. Hororong~
30001034.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>功勋牌</>在旁边的盒子里.呼罗隆~

30001035.English_Text: First, check out the carpenter's residence.

30001036.Original_Text: 이곳에서 북쪽 길을 따라가다보면\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>목공의 거처</>가 나올겁니다.
30001036.English_Text:
Take the road north from here and you'll find
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>The Carpenters' Dwelling</>.
30001036.Chinese_Text:
从这里往北走,就会来到
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>木工居所</>.

30001038.Original_Text: 배송된 게 설마 이 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>괴물</>이었던 거야?! 세상에...
30001038.English_Text: Is this <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Monster</> supposed to be delivered?! Oh my...
30001038.Chinese_Text: 应该是送来的这个<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>怪物</>吧?!天啊...

30001040.English_Text:
Good job.
Take the plaque from <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Crate</>.
30001040.Chinese_Text:
感谢您的辛勤工作.从
 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]> 盒子</> 中取出牌匾.

30001041.English_Text: Huh, what do you think of this?

30001043.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]> 义务警卫哨</>就在这座山上!

30001044.English_Text: Let's meet at <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>in front of the bamboo</> when we're done!
30001044.Chinese_Text: 调查结束后,我们在竹</>前面的<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>见面吧!

30001045.English_Text: Oh my... this wasn't a normal guy?!

30001048.English_Text:
The award plaque is in this <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>box</>!
Thank you so much for your help~
30001048.Chinese_Text:
功勋牌就在这个<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>盒子</>里!
非常感谢你的帮助~

30001050.English_Text:
Is this the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>letter</>?
What does it say?
30001050.Chinese_Text:
这是<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>对应</>?
上面写的是什么?

30001051.English_Text: Hmmm~ If you have unrequited love for a long time, you will get sick inside~
30001051.Chinese_Text: 嗯~暗恋久了你会生病的~

30001052.Original_Text: 아, 쓸데없는 소리 하지 말고\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>유공상패</>나 갖고 썩 가버려!
30001052.English_Text:
Ah, don't say nonsense
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Place of Merit</>I'm going away with you!
30001052.Chinese_Text:
呵呵,废话少说.
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>功勋勋章</>带我走!

30001053.English_Text: The plaque I sell is a genuine guarantee!
30001053.Chinese_Text: 我卖的奖牌是正品保证!

30001054.Original_Text: 좀 비싸긴 하지만 대신 귀찮은 의뢰를 하나 덜 할 수 있다찍!
30001054.English_Text: It's a bit expensive, but I can do one less annoying quest instead!
30001054.Chinese_Text: 这有点贵,但你可以做一个不那么烦人的任务!

30001059.English_Text: How do you think <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Fertility</> is right for you?

30001060.Original_Text: 세상에... 방금 무슨 일이 일어난 거지?
30001060.English_Text: Oh my God... what just happened?

30001061.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>, 너 설마 노이의 비옥에 반응한 거야?!
30001061.English_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>, did you really react to Neu's Fertility?!

30001063.English_Text: Have you collected all the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Bulmor Core</>?

30001066.Original_Text: 저 사람인가? \n그 무술대회장 사건의 주인공 말이야...
30001066.English_Text:
Is that him? 
The main character of that martial arts event...
30001066.Chinese_Text:
是那个人吗
那场武术比赛的主角……

30001067.English_Text: Shhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhreum you said you are watching closely.

30001068.English_Text: Try using the Guardian Spirit Summon Scroll!
30001068.Chinese_Text: 尝试使用守护灵召唤卷轴!

30001070.English_Text: Where are you going to run away? Are you still here?
30001070.Chinese_Text: 你要逃到哪里去?你留在这里吗?

30001072.English_Text: Does anyone have a plaque of merit?

30001073.Original_Text: 유공상패를 저한테 주시면 유용한 물건으로 교환해드립니다~
30001073.English_Text: Give me a plaque of merit and I will exchange it for something useful~
30001073.Chinese_Text: 如果你给我一块功德牌,我会用它来换取有用的东西.

30001074.Original_Text: 언젠가는 수월평원의 유공상패를 종류별로 모두 모을 겁니다. 하하
30001074.English_Text: One day, I will collect all Suwol Plains plaques of merit by type. Haha
30001074.Chinese_Text: 总有一天,我会按种类收集水月平原的所有功勋勋章.哈哈

30001075.Original_Text: 에헴!!! 자자, 다들 잘 들으라고! 케헴!!!
30001075.English_Text: Ahem!!! Come on, everyone, listen up! Kehem!!!
30001075.Chinese_Text: 咳咳!!!来,大家听好!凯赫姆!!!

30001076.Original_Text: 현 시각 이후 나, 임연수의 허가를 받지 않은 수월항 내 모든 활동은 불법으로 간주한다!
30001076.English_Text: After this time, all activities in Suwol Port without permission from me or Yeonsu Lim are considered illegal!
30001076.Chinese_Text: 在此之后,未经我或Yeonsu Lim许可在水月港的所有活动都被视为非法!

30001077.Original_Text: 크흠!!!! 대어방 총타주 권한에 따라 \n반박, 항의, 불응 시에는 처벌을 받을 수 있으니까아 주의 하라고오~?
30001077.English_Text:
Heh heh!!! Depending on the authority to shoot the big fish room, 
You may be punished for rebuttal, protest, or non-compliance, so please be careful~?
30001077.Chinese_Text:
嗯!!!!根据 Daeeobang 的 gun-ta-ju 权威, 
 小心,因为您可能会因反驳、抗议或不遵守而受到惩罚.

30001078.Original_Text: 뭐? 제정신인가? 언질도 안 주다가 이렇게 갑자기 활동 금지를 때린다고?
30001078.English_Text: What? Are you sane? You're not even talking about it and then suddenly getting banned like this?
30001078.Chinese_Text: 什么?你神智正常吗?你说你什么都没说,然后突然被禁止参加这种活动?

30001079.English_Text: Ah!!! There's going to be an uproar again, my lord.
30001079.Chinese_Text: 啊啊啊!!!师父,又要暴动了.

30001080.English_Text: Why are you so mad again...

30001081.English_Text: What the hell are you doing that?!

30001082.Original_Text: 그러게. 저번에 훼방질 놓은 게 얼마나 됐다고 말이야.
30001082.English_Text: Yeah. How long was the last time you disturbed me?
30001082.Chinese_Text: 是的.你最后一次搞砸是多久了?

30001083.English_Text: Your bosses are going to have a lot of trouble.
